医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
大麻的使用与有精神病风险的年轻人的大脑变化有关一项新的研究发现，有精神病风险的年轻人大脑连接能力下降，吸食大麻后这种缺陷似乎会恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Cannabis-use-linked-to-brain-changes-in-young-adults-at-risk-of-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Cannabis-use-linked-to-brain-changes-in-young-adults-at-risk-of-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=238ed69e-865e-4d11-a452-0242eb6c6b80 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 19:55:53 -0500 Cannabis use linked to brain changes in young adults at risk of psychosis
远程医疗在神经病学中的使用受种族和邻里差异的影响根据 2024 年 11 月 20 日《Neurology® Clinical Practice》在线期刊上发表的一项研究，对于看神经科医生的人来说，他们的年龄、种族、民族和社区可能会影响他们亲自看病还是通过远程医疗虚拟看病，美国神经病学学会的官方期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Telemedicine-use-in-neurology-affected-by-race-and-neighborhood-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Telemedicine-use-in-neurology-affected-by-race-and-neighborhood-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c13824f-584a-4861-8f74-433aba46efc2 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 19:52:39 -0500 Telemedicine use in neurology affected by race and neighborhood disparities
南加州大学研究人员获得 600 万美元资金用于推进干性 AMD 治疗该州的干细胞机构加州再生医学研究所 (CIRM) 已向南加州大学艾伦博士和夏洛特金斯伯格生物医学治疗研究所以及南加州大学罗斯基眼科研究所的一个团队提供了为期两年、价值 600 万美元的资助，以推进针对老年人失明主要原因之一的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/USC-researchers-receive-246-million-to-advance-dry-AMD-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/USC-researchers-receive-246-million-to-advance-dry-AMD-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0570309-9f3f-4284-b5ca-d8c4829247b5 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 19:47:48 -0500 USC researchers receive $6 million to advance dry AMD treatment
新的人工智能工具识别影响孕产妇护理结果的关键人为因素拉夫堡大学的研究人员开发了一种人工智能 (AI) 工具，可以识别影响孕产妇护理结果的关键人为因素，支持为改善母亲和婴儿安全所做的持续努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/New-AI-tool-identizes-key- human-factors-influencing-maternity-care-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/New-AI-tool-identizes-key- human-factors-influencing-maternity-care-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a0df0df-d00e-426c-997f-b3e52619bb08 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 19:44:31 -0500 New AI tool identifies key human factors influencing maternity care outcomes
AI模型结合语音和大脑活动来诊断抑郁症抑郁症是最常见的精神疾病之一。全球有多达 2.8 亿人受到这种疾病的影响，因此考纳斯理工大学 (KTU) 的研究人员开发了一种人工智能 (AI) 模型，可以根据言语和大脑神经活动帮助识别抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/AI-model-combines-speech-and-brain-activity-to-diagnose-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/AI-model-combines-speech-and-brain-activity-to-diagnose-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=321cd220-5a88-48d3-9dc0-a4a14afb915e Wed, 20 Nov 2024 19:39:40 -0500 AI model combines speech and brain activity to diagnose depression
口服药物羟丁酸钠有望治疗喉肌张力障碍喉肌张力障碍 (LD) 是一种罕见的神经系统疾病，由于无法控制的声带痉挛而严重影响人的说话能力，可能对人的社交生活、就业和心理健康产生衰弱影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Oral-medication-sodium-oxybate-shows-promise-for-treating-laryngeal-dystonia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Oral-medication-sodium-oxybate-shows-promise-for-treating-laryngeal-dystonia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04647350-59c3-4336-be41-85a4c8e6bbdd Wed, 20 Nov 2024 19:28:14 -0500 Oral medication sodium oxybate shows promise for treating laryngeal dystonia
具有里程碑意义的研究强调美国儿童 IBD 发病率不断上升今天发表在《胃肠病学》杂志上的一项开创性研究提供了迄今为止对美国儿童炎症性肠病 (IBD) 患病率最全面的评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Landmark-study-highlights-having-pediatric-IBD-rates-across-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Landmark-study-highlights-having-pediatric-IBD-rates-across-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34fbf01b-5249-418a-9d7e-88014292c625 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 19:18:32 -0500 Landmark study highlights growing pediatric IBD rates across the U.S.
科罗拉多州儿童医院获得著名的心肌病认可科罗拉多儿童医院 (Children's Colorado) 被儿童心肌病基金会 (CCF) 指定为心肌病护理中心，该基金会是一个全国性非营利组织，致力于改善心肌病儿童的健康结果和生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Childrens-Colorado-earns-prestigious-cardiomyopathy-recognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Childrens-Colorado-earns-prestigious-cardiomyopathy-recognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=586c879e-e032-4189-adcb-b45235d82f7e Wed, 20 Nov 2024 19:01:54 -0500 Children's Colorado earns prestigious cardiomyopathy recognition
香烟烟雾会导致口咽部微生物群紊乱，从而加剧流感的严重程度新研究表明，香烟烟雾会导致口咽部微生物群紊乱，从而加重甲型流感病毒感染的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Cigarette-smoke-can-induce-disordered-oropharyngeal-microbiota-that-aggravates-flu-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/Cigarette-smoke-can-induce-disordered-oropharyngeal-microbiota-that-aggravates-flu-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bd3ca63-c513-48f2-bc00-cf6ff1590132 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 18:52:05 -0500 Cigarette smoke can induce disordered oropharyngeal microbiota that aggravates flu severity
基于 CRISPR 的疗法被证明对甲状腺素运载蛋白淀粉样变性患者安全有效伦敦大学学院和皇家自由医院的研究表明，一种对罕见心脏病患者基因进行“编辑”的新型疗法已被证明是安全有效的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/CRISPR-based-therapy-shown-to-be-safe- effective-for-people-with-transthyretin-amyloidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241120/CRISPR-based-therapy-shown-to-be-safe- effective-for-people-with-transthyretin-amyloidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f97ea78b-8c5e-4a0b-9b06-399dcdf20121 Wed, 20 Nov 2024 18:46:07 -0500 CRISPR-based therapy shown to be safe, effective for people with transthyretin amyloidosis
